data.text: Hotel was great but the best thing about the hotel was the staff!! Honestly never stayed at a hotel where the staff were so attentive and genuinely nice. Everyday I was at reception asking for recommendations for places to eat and things to do. They bent of backwards to help us, made some amazing recommendations and made all the phone calls always with a smile!!! I will definitely stay here again because of the lovely staff, highly recommend!
data.title: Amazing staff, good facilities

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear KenneyH5,

It is a delight to read you have had a great stay with us.  Your kind words in particular for the staff are a true source of motivation for all of us to continue working in the same direction.  We look forward to welcoming you back, in the meantime we remain at your entire disposal.

With kindest regards,

Yves
Hotel Manager
owner_response.author: Yves Vandekerckhove

data.text: Came for two nights in April. Wonderful hotel. From check in on (a trainee but clearly well trained!) we were meant to feel very special. Nice touches: glass of cava on arrival, turn down service. Attic rooms have a lovely balcony to get away from the sight seeing. Lovely area. Great bars and restaurants a-plenty near by. Bed, beautifully comfortable! Don’t believe the reviews slating breakfast - loads of choice and lots of local specialities. Appreciated the contact from the experience team before and during stay - it seems to matter to this hotel that guest have a good time. Hope to come back one day and would recommend very highly…
data.title: Splendid stay…

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Skirmishofwit,

It is a delight to read you have had a splendid stay with us.  Thank you once agina for your visit and for having taken a moment to share this rewarding feedback.  Hopefully we will be able to welcome you back, in the meantime we remain at your entire disposal.

With kindest regards,

Yves
Hotel Manager
owner_response.author: Yves Vandekerckhove

data.text: Very good hotel with a perfect staff , at a very good location. The breakfast is bit boring, the roof top pool is not heated (cold before summer). The room is well equipped and spacious, the bath has glass wall, so it's rather for couples. The hotel has two marvelous restaurants and bar, good shops are close, la Rambla is also close
data.title: Perfect staff

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Gollam76,

Thank you once again for your recent visit and for having taken a moment to share this kind feedback.  It is a pleasure to read you have had a perfect stay with us.  We have taken good note of your feedback regarding the breakfast service and we will look into this together with the team of Xerta Restaurant.  Regarding our pool.  Normally it is heated but due to the drought in Catalunya we are not allowed to re-fill the pool-.  Heating the pool would make the water evaporate faster, so we had to stop heating.  We hope the situation will turn around soon.  We hope to be able to welcome you back, in the meantime we remain at your entire disposal.

With kindest regards,

Yves 
Hotel Manager
owner_response.author: Yves Vandekerckhove

data.text:
We chose this hotel because of its fab location and obviously the rooftop pool.

Check in was at 3 but our room was ready as they had upgraded us to a bigger room on floor 7 which was amazing.

Breakfast was lovely, lots of choice and the staff were always extremely friendly and polite.

The pool was brisk but my husband still managed to have a swim as the weather was 23 degrees C 

It was lovely chilling with a cuppa and a beer with the fab view..

Shower was amazing ..!! Bed was a queen and was very comfortable.. and aircon worked a treat.

I would definitely recommend this hotel.
data.title: A lovely 3 night stay

user_location.name: Mortimer Common, Stratfield Mortimer, Berkshire, England

data.text: I really enjoyed our stay at Ohla Eixample. I choose this hotel to celebrate my husband’s birthday and they were perfect in helping me to organize the surprise for him in every detail. They have also upgraded us on a larger and prettier room. On top of that, breakfast was very good (even if I would have expected a bit more choice, being a 5* hotel)
data.title: Amazing stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
